# UITextDropEditability.no

**Case**

A text-drop editability specifier indicating that a noneditable text view does not accept drops.

## Declaration

```swift
case no
```

## Editability styles

- **UITextDropEditability.temporary**: A text-drop editability specifier indicating that a noneditable text view does accept drops but reverts to its noneditable status immediately afterward.
- **UITextDropEditability.yes**: A text-drop editability specifier indicating that a noneditable text view does accept drops, and that the dropped text remains editable after the drop is finished.
